author: Simon Difford
description: Dilution is key to this cocktail so either shake with crushed ice (as per the original recipe) or do as I do and add chilled water. Even then, to quote Victor Bergeron, "This'll tuck you away neatly - and pick you up and throw you right to the floor".
name: Pancho Villa
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
20 ml Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
